sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_978cdeecdbaa90d0c7e55886dc961961
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="GitHub Guest User Management">db008104db2adc90c7e55886dc961951</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:f8bd8144db6adc90c7e55886dc9619c7</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Onboard Date before Offboard and today</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	var today = new Date();
	//alert(today);
	var str = newValue.toString() + " 23:59:59";	
	
	if (today > new Date(str)){
		g_form.clearValue("onboard_date");
		g_form.showFieldMsg("onboard_date", "Onboard date cannot be before today", "error");
	}
	else if (g_form.getValue("offboard_date") && newValue){
		//if onboard date and new value not empty
	
		var ajax = new GlideAjax('x_radi_github.ClientDateTimeUtils');
		ajax.addParam('sysparm_name','dateBeforeAfter');
		ajax.addParam('sysparm_fdt', newValue);
		ajax.addParam('sysparm_sdt', g_form.getValue("offboard_date"));
		ajax.getXML(doSomething);

		
	}
	function doSomething(response){
			var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
			if (answer == "true"){
				g_form.clearValue("onboard_date");
				g_form.showFieldMsg("onboard_date", "Onboard date cannot be after offboard date", "error");
				
			}
			if (answer == "equal"){
				g_form.clearValue("onboard_date");
				g_form.showFieldMsg("onboard_date", "Onboard date cannot be the same as offboard date", "error");
			}
			
			
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-07 14:28:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>978cdeecdbaa90d0c7e55886dc961961</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Onboard Date before Offboard and today</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_978cdeecdbaa90d0c7e55886dc961961</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-21 17:50:20</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Onboard Date before Offboard and today

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="GitHub Guest User Management">db008104db2adc90c7e55886dc961951</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Hide Fields</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
	
	var choice = g_form.getValue("choice_list");
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    g_form.setDisplay('cancel_invitation', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('pending_invitations', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('repo', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('vendor_name', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('security_check', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('collaborators_add', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('access_level', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('onboard_date', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('offboard_date', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('collaborators_remove', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('remove_offboard_date', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('queue_remove', false);
	g_form.setDisplay('queue', false);
	
	if (choice == "add_user"){
		g_form.setDisplay("repo", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("vendor_name", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("security_check", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("collaborators_add", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("access_level", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("onboard_date", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("offboard_date", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("repo", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("vendor_name", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("security_check", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("collaborators_add", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("access_level", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("onboard_date", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("offboard_date", true);
		
	}
	/*
	else if (choice == "remove_user"){
		g_form.setDisplay("repo", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("repo", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("vendor_name", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("security_check", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("collaborators_remove", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("access_level", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("remove_offboard_date", true);
	}
	else if (choice == "cancel_invitation"){
		g_form.setDisplay("cancel_invitation", true);
		g_form.setDisplay('pending_invitations', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('repo', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('vendor_name', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('security_check', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('collaborators_add', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('access_level', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('onboard_date', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('offboard_date', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('collaborators_remove', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('remove_offboard_date', false);
		
	}
	*/
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-18 18:37:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>26a723c6db5b1010c7e55886dc96190b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hide Fields</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_26a723c6db5b1010c7e55886dc96190b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-18 19:52:06</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_64105654db6650d0c7e55886dc961943
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time>1970-01-01 00:00:00</entered_time><name>Remove Github Users 6 Months Ago</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="Jeff Mu">0a020446db4ea410080f71c3e29619ad</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2020-08-06 18:54:30</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 11:00:00</run_time><run_type>daily</run_type><script><![CDATA[var date = new GlideDateTime(new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue());

var gr = new GlideRecord("x_radi_github_users");
gr.addNotNullQuery("offboard_date");


gr.query();

while (gr.next()){

 var dur = GlideDateTime.subtract(new GlideDateTime(gr.offboard_date), new GlideDateTime(date.getDate()));
 dur = dur.getDisplayValue();
 dur = dur.split(" ")[0];
 
 if ( dur >= 183 ){
	gr.deleteRecord();
 }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-06 18:55:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>64105654db6650d0c7e55886dc961943</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Remove Github Users 6 Months Ago</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_64105654db6650d0c7e55886dc961943</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-06 19:15:24</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_356b5948dbaadc90c7e55886dc961929
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_radi_github.GithubUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GithubUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var GithubUtils = Class.create();
GithubUtils.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
		this.org = gs.getProperty('x_radi_github.Github Organization');
	},
	
	getAlias: function(){
		var scopeAlias = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
		scopeAlias.addQuery("name", "GitHub User Management");
		scopeAlias.query();
		if (scopeAlias.next()){
			var aliasGr = new GlideRecord("sys_alias");
			aliasGr.addQuery("sys_scope", scopeAlias.sys_id);
			aliasGr.query();
			if (aliasGr.next()){
				var connect = new GlideRecord("sys_connection");
				connect.addQuery("connection_alias", aliasGr.sys_id);
				connect.query();
				if (connect.next()){
					return aliasGr.sys_id;
				}
			}
		}
	},
	getMyRepos: function() {
		var repos = [];
		var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		if(user.get(gs.getUserID())) {
			var collabRepo = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_users');
			collabRepo.addQuery('user', user.x_radi_github_github_username); 
			collabRepo.addQuery('user', '!=', '');
			collabRepo.addQuery('admin', true);
			collabRepo.query();
			while(collabRepo.next()) {
				repos.push(collabRepo.getValue('repo'));
			}
		}
		return repos;
	},
	syncRepos: function(alias) {
		var reposFound = [];
		var repos = [];
		var done = false;
		var page = 1;
		//populate last page from the first call
		var repoResponse = this.getRepos(alias, page);
		var repoBody = repoResponse[0];
		var last = repoResponse[repoResponse.length-1];
		while (!done){
			if(page > last) {
				done = true;
			}
			else {
				repos = repos.concat(repoBody);
				page++;
				repoBody = this.getRepos(alias, page)[0];
			}
		}
         
		for(var i in repos) {
			var repoID;
			var repo = repos[i];
			var repoGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
			var repoName = repo.name;
			if(repoGR.get('repo', repoName)) {
				repoID = repoGR.sys_id;
				repoGR.owner = repo.owner.login;
				repoGR.update();
			}
			else {
				repoGR.initialize();
				repoGR.repo = repoName;
				repoGR.owner = repo.owner.login;
				repoID = repoGR.insert();
				
			}
			reposFound.push(repoID);
			this.syncCollaborators(alias, repoName, repoID);
			this.syncInvites(alias, repoName, repoID);
		}
		var reposToRemove = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
		reposToRemove.addEncodedQuery('sys_idNOT IN' + reposFound);
		reposToRemove.query();
		while(reposToRemove.next()) {
			reposToRemove.deleteRecord();
		}
		
	},
	syncReposCollabs: function(alias) {
		var reposFound = [];
		var repos = [];
		var done = false;
		var page = 1;
		
		//populate last page from the first call
		var repoResponse = this.getRepos(alias, page);
		var repoBody = repoResponse[0];
		var last = repoResponse[repoResponse.length-1];
		while (!done){
			if(page > last) {
				done = true;
			}
			else {
				repos = repos.concat(repoBody);
				page++;
				repoBody = this.getRepos(alias, page)[0];
			}
		}
         
		for(var i in repos) {
			var repoID;
			var repo = repos[i];
			var repoGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
			var repoName = repo.name;
			if(repoGR.get('repo', repoName)) {
				repoID = repoGR.sys_id;
				repoGR.owner = repo.owner.login;
				repoGR.update();
			}
			else {
				repoGR.initialize();
				repoGR.repo = repoName;
				repoGR.owner = repo.owner.login;
				repoID = repoGR.insert();
			}
			reposFound.push(repoID);
		
			this.syncCollaborators(alias, repoName, repoID);
			//this.syncInvites(alias, repoName, repoID);
		}
		var reposToRemove = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
		reposToRemove.addEncodedQuery('sys_idNOT IN' + reposFound);
		reposToRemove.query();
		while(reposToRemove.next()) {
			reposToRemove.deleteRecord();
		}
		
	},
	syncReposInvites: function(alias) {
		var reposFound = [];
		var repos = [];
		var done = false;
		var page = 1;
		
		//populate last page from the first call
		var repoResponse = this.getRepos(alias, page);
		var repoBody = repoResponse[0];
		var last = repoResponse[repoResponse.length-1];
		while (!done){
			if(page > last) {
				done = true;
			}
			else {
				repos = repos.concat(repoBody);
				page++;
				repoBody = this.getRepos(alias, page)[0];
			}
		}
         
		for(var i in repos) {
			var repoID;
			var repo = repos[i];
			var repoGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
			var repoName = repo.name;
			if(repoGR.get('repo', repoName)) {
				repoID = repoGR.sys_id;
				repoGR.owner = repo.owner.login;
				repoGR.update();
			}
			else {
				repoGR.initialize();
				repoGR.repo = repoName;
				repoGR.owner = repo.owner.login;
				repoID = repoGR.insert();
				this.syncCollaborators(alias, repoName, repoID);
			}
			reposFound.push(repoID);
			//this.syncCollaborators(alias, repoName, repoID);
			this.syncInvites(alias, repoName, repoID);
		}
		var reposToRemove = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
		reposToRemove.addEncodedQuery('sys_idNOT IN' + reposFound);
		reposToRemove.query();
		while(reposToRemove.next()) {
			reposToRemove.deleteRecord();
		}
	},
	
	syncCollaborators: function(alias, repoName, repoID) {
		var collabs = [];
		var done = false;
		var page = 1;
		
		var collabResponse = this.getCollaborators(alias, repoName, page);
		var collabBody = collabResponse[0];
		var last = collabResponse[collabResponse.length-1];
	
		while(!done) {
			if(page > last) {
				done = true;
			}
			else {
				collabs = collabs.concat(collabBody);
				page++;
				collabBody = this.getCollaborators(alias, repoName, page)[0];
			}
		}
		var collabsFound = [];
		for(var k in collabs) {
			var collab = collabs[k];
			var collabLogin = collab.login;
			var collabGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_users');
			collabGR.addQuery('repo', repoID);
			collabGR.addQuery('user', collabLogin);
			collabGR.query();
			if(collabGR.next()) {
				collabsFound.push(collabGR.getValue('sys_id'));
				collabGR.admin = collab.permissions.admin;
				collabGR.push = collab.permissions.push;
				collabGR.pull = collab.permissions.pull;
				collabGR.state = "Added";
				collabGR.update();
			}
			else {
				collabGR.initialize();
				collabGR.repo = repoID;
				collabGR.user = collabLogin;
				collabGR.admin = collab.permissions.admin;
				collabGR.push = collab.permissions.push;
				collabGR.pull = collab.permissions.pull;
				collabGR.state = "Added";
				var newID = collabGR.insert();
				collabsFound.push(newID);
			}
		}

		var collabsToRemove = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_users');
		collabsToRemove.addEncodedQuery('repo=' + repoID + '^sys_idNOT IN' + collabsFound + '^state=Added');
		collabsToRemove.query();
		while(collabsToRemove.next()) {
			collabsToRemove.state = "Removed";
			//collabsToRemove.deleteRecord();
		}
	},
	
	syncInvites: function(alias, repoName, repoID){
		
		var invites = [];
		var done = false;
		var page = 1;
		
		var inviteResponse = this.getInvites(alias, repoName, page);
		var inviteBody = inviteResponse[0];
		var last = inviteResponse[inviteResponse.length-1];
	
		while(!done) {
			if(page > last) {
				done = true;
			}
			else {
				invites = invites.concat(inviteBody);
				page++;
				inviteBody = this.getInvites(alias, repoName, page)[0];
			}
		}
		var invitesFound = [];
		for(var k in invites) {
			var invite = invites[k];
			var inviteLogin = invite.invitee.login;
			var inviteGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_users');
			inviteGR.addQuery('repo', repoID);
			inviteGR.addQuery('user', inviteLogin);
			inviteGR.query();
			if(inviteGR.next()) {
				invitesFound.push(inviteGR.getValue('sys_id'));
				if (invite.permissions == "admin"){
					inviteGR.admin = true;
					inviteGR.pull = true;
					inviteGR.push = true;
				}
				else if (invite.permissions == "read"){
					inviteGR.admin = false;
					inviteGR.pull = true;
					inviteGR.push = false;
				}
				else if (invite.permissions == "write"){
					inviteGR.admin = false;
					inviteGR.pull = true;
					inviteGR.push = true;
				}
				inviteGR.invite_id = invite.id;
				inviteGR.state = "Invited" ;
				inviteGR.update();
			}
			else {
				inviteGR.initialize();
				inviteGR.repo = repoID;
				inviteGR.user = inviteLogin;
				if (invite.permissions == "admin"){
					inviteGR.admin = true;
					inviteGR.pull = true;
					inviteGR.push = true;
				}
				else if (invite.permissions == "read"){
					inviteGR.admin = false;
					inviteGR.pull = true;
					inviteGR.push = false;
				}
				else if (invite.permissions == "write"){
					inviteGR.admin = false;
					inviteGR.pull = true;
					inviteGR.push = true;
				}
				inviteGR.invite_id = invite.id;
				inviteGR.state = "Invited";
				var newID = inviteGR.insert();
				invitesFound.push(newID);
			}
		}
		
		var invitesToRemove = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_users');
		invitesToRemove.addEncodedQuery('repo=' + repoID + '^sys_idNOT IN' +invitesFound+'^state=Invited');
		invitesToRemove.query();
		while(invitesToRemove.next()) {
			invitesToRemove.deleteRecord();
		}
			
	},
	
	getRepos: function(alias, page) {
		var provider = new sn_cc.ConnectionInfoProvider();
		var connectionInfo = provider.getConnectionInfo(alias);
		if (connectionInfo != null) {
			var connName = connectionInfo.getAttribute("name");
			var connUrl = connectionInfo.getAttribute("connection_url");
			var connUser = connectionInfo.getCredentialAttribute("user_name");
			var connPass = connectionInfo.getCredentialAttribute("password");
		}
		var res = [];
		var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
		restMessage.setEndpoint(connUrl + 'orgs/' + this.org +  '/repos?per_page=100&page=' + page);
		restMessage.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
		restMessage.setBasicAuth(connUser, connPass);
		var response = restMessage.execute();
		var responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
		var header = response.getHeader("Link");
		if (header && header.indexOf('rel="last"') != -1 ){
			//if multiple pages
			var last = header.match('(&page=)([^,]*)(>; rel="last")')[2];
			res.push(JSON.parse(responseBody));
			res.push(parseInt(last,10));
		}
		else{
			//if one page
			res.push(JSON.parse(responseBody));
			res.push(2);
		}
		return res;
	},
	
	getCollaborators: function(alias, repo, page) {
		var provider = new sn_cc.ConnectionInfoProvider();
		var connectionInfo = provider.getConnectionInfo(alias);
		if (connectionInfo != null) {
			var connName = connectionInfo.getAttribute("name");
			var connUrl = connectionInfo.getAttribute("connection_url");
			var connUser = connectionInfo.getCredentialAttribute("user_name");
			var connPass = connectionInfo.getCredentialAttribute("password");
		}
		
		var result = [];
		var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
		restMessage.setEndpoint(connUrl + 'repos/' + this.org + '/' + repo + '/collaborators?per_page=100&page=' + page);
		restMessage.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
		restMessage.setBasicAuth(connUser, connPass);
		var response = restMessage.execute();
		var responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
		var header = response.getHeader("Link");

		if (header && header.indexOf('rel="last"') != -1){
			var last = header.match('(&page=)([^,]*)(>; rel="last")')[2];
			result.push(JSON.parse(responseBody));
			result.push(parseInt(last,10));
		}
		else{
			//if one page
			result.push(JSON.parse(responseBody));
			result.push(2);
			
		}
		return result;
	},
	
	getInvites: function(alias, repo, page) {
		var provider = new sn_cc.ConnectionInfoProvider();
		var connectionInfo = provider.getConnectionInfo(alias);
		if (connectionInfo != null) {
			var connName = connectionInfo.getAttribute("name");
			var connUrl = connectionInfo.getAttribute("connection_url");
			var connUser = connectionInfo.getCredentialAttribute("user_name");
			var connPass = connectionInfo.getCredentialAttribute("password");
		}
		var result = [];
		var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
		restMessage.setEndpoint(connUrl + 'repos/' + this.org + '/' + repo + '/invitations?per_page=100&page=' + page);
		restMessage.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
		restMessage.setBasicAuth(connUser, connPass);
		var response = restMessage.execute();
		var responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
		var header = response.getHeader("Link");
		
		if (header && header.indexOf('rel="last"') != -1){
			var last = header.match('(&page=)([^,]*)(>; rel="last")')[2];
			result.push(JSON.parse(responseBody));
			result.push(parseInt(last,10));
		}
		else{
			//if one page
			result.push(JSON.parse(responseBody));
			result.push(2);
			
		}
		return result;
	},
	
	

	getMember: function(login) {
		var org = gs.getProperty("x_radi_github.Github Organization");
		
		var obj = {};
		var r1 = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Github', 'GET validate user');
		r1.setStringParameter("username", login);
		var response1 = r1.execute();
		var responseBody1 = response1.haveError() ? response1.getErrorMessage() : response1.getBody();
		var httpStatus1 = response1.getStatusCode();
		
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Github', 'Get Member');
		r.setStringParameter("login", login);
		r.setStringParameter("org", org);
		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		
		obj.validate = httpStatus1;
		obj.member = httpStatus;
		
		return JSON.stringify(obj);
	},
		
	offboardCollaborator: function(alias){
		/*this function will loop through the table for people that are <7 days away from being offboarded.
		if its today, it will offboard them*/
		
		var provider = new sn_cc.ConnectionInfoProvider();
		var connectionInfo = provider.getConnectionInfo(alias);
		if (connectionInfo != null) {
			var connName = connectionInfo.getAttribute("name");
			var connUrl = connectionInfo.getAttribute("connection_url");
			var connUser = connectionInfo.getCredentialAttribute("user_name");
			var connPass = connectionInfo.getCredentialAttribute("password");
		}
		var today = new GlideDateTime(new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue()).getDate();
		var gr = new GlideRecord("x_radi_github_users");
		gr.addEncodedQuery("state=Ready^ORstate=Invited^ORstate=Added^offboard_dateISNOTEMPTY");
		gr.query();
		while (gr.next()){
			var dur = GlideDateTime.subtract(today, new GlideDateTime(gr.offboard_date));
			var days = dur.getRoundedDayPart();
			if (days <= 7 && days > 0){
				
				var user = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
				user.addQuery("user_name", gr.requested_by);
				user.query();
				if (user.next()){
					if (user.active == true){
						//if user is active send to them else to bain
						gs.eventQueue("x_radi_github.github.removal", gr , user.sys_id , days);
					}
					else{
						//change for bain
						var cloud = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
						if (cloud.get("user_name", "RapdevCloudInfrastructure")){
							gs.eventQueue("x_radi_github.github.removal", gr , "cloudteam@example.com" , days);
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else if (days == 0){
				//offboard the user
				//remove their invite if necessary
				if (gr.state == "Invited"){
					var res = [];
					var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
					rm.setHttpMethod('delete');
					var owner = gr.repo.owner;
					var repo = gr.getDisplayValue("repo");
					var invite_id = gr.invite_id;
					rm.setEndpoint(connUrl + "repos/" + owner + "/" + repo + "/invitations/" + invite_id);
					rm.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
					rm.setBasicAuth(connUser, connPass);
					
					var responsem = rm.execute();
					//var responseBodym = JSON.parse(responsem.getBody());
					var responseBodym = responsem.haveError() ? responsem.getErrorMessage() : responsem.getBody();
					var httpStatusm = responsem.getStatusCode();

					if (httpStatusm == 204){
						gr.state = "Removed";
					}
					else{
						gr.u_state = "Error";
						gr.update();

					}
					
				}
				var removeOwner = gr.repo.owner;
				var removeRepo = gr.getDisplayValue("repo");
				var removeUser = gr.user;
				
				var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
				r.setHttpMethod('delete');
				r.setEndpoint(connUrl + 'repos/' + removeOwner + '/' + removeRepo + '/collaborators/' + removeUser);
				r.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
				r.setBasicAuth(connUser, connPass);
						
				var response = r.execute();
				var responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
				var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
				//remove from the custom table
				if (httpStatus == 204){
					gr.state = "Removed";
				}
				else {
					gr.state = "Error";
			}
			gr.update();
		}
		}
	},
	onboardCollaborator: function(alias){
		/*this function will loop through the table for people that are <7 days away from being offboarded.
		if its today, it will offboard them*/
		
		var provider = new sn_cc.ConnectionInfoProvider();
		var connectionInfo = provider.getConnectionInfo(alias);
		if (connectionInfo != null) {
			var connName = connectionInfo.getAttribute("name");
			var connUrl = connectionInfo.getAttribute("connection_url");
			var connUser = connectionInfo.getCredentialAttribute("user_name");
			var connPass = connectionInfo.getCredentialAttribute("password");
		}
		var today = new GlideDateTime(new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue()).getDate();
		var gr = new GlideRecord("x_radi_github_users");
		gr.addQuery("onboard_date", "!=", "");
		gr.addQuery("state", "Ready");
		gr.query();
		while (gr.next()){
			var owner = gr.repo.owner;
			var repo = gr.getDisplayValue("repo");
			var username = gr.user;
			var dur = GlideDateTime.subtract(today, new GlideDateTime(gr.onboard_date));
			var days = dur.getRoundedDayPart();
			if (days == 0){
				//offboard the user
				var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
				r.setHttpMethod('put');
				r.setEndpoint(connUrl + 'repos/' + owner + '/' + repo + '/collaborators/' + username);
				r.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
				r.setBasicAuth(connUser, connPass);
				var body;
				if (gr.push == true){
					body = {"permission":"push"};
					r.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));
					//r.setStringParameter("permission", "push");
				}
				else{
					body = {"permission":"pull"};
					r.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));
					//r.setStringParameter("permission", "pull");
				}
			
				var response = r.execute();
				//var responseBody = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
				var responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
				var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
				
				responseBody = JSON.parse(responseBody);
				//update state to added
				if (httpStatus == 201){
					gr.state = "Invited";
					gr.invite_id = responseBody.id;
				}
				else{
					gr.state = "Error";
				}
				gr.update();
			}
			gr.update();
		}
	},
	
	
	cleanUsers: function() {
		var clean = new GlideRecord("x_radi_github_users");
		clean.query();
		
		while (clean.next()){
			if (!clean.repo){
				clean.deleteRecord();
			}
		}
	},
	
    type: 'GithubUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-05 20:26:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>356b5948dbaadc90c7e55886dc961929</sys_id><sys_mod_count>130</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GithubUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_356b5948dbaadc90c7e55886dc961929</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>reese@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-03 13:22:18</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="GitHub Guest User Management">db008104db2adc90c7e55886dc961951</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>If user has pending  invitations</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
	
 
	var ajax = new GlideAjax('x_radi_github.GithubClient');
	ajax.addParam('sysparm_name','getPendingInvites');
	ajax.getXML(doSomething);

		
	}
	function doSomething(response){
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

		if (answer){

			g_form.setVisible("cancel_invitation", true);
		}
		else{

			g_form.setVisible("cancel_invitation", false);
		}

	
	
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-06 20:42:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0ea72614dbe650d0c7e55886dc96192f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>41</sys_mod_count><sys_name>If user has pending  invitations</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0ea72614dbe650d0c7e55886dc96192f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-18 19:52:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

	if (g_form.getValue("choice_list") != "cancel_invitation"){
		if (!g_form.getValue("queue") && !g_form.getValue("queue_remove")){
			g_form.addErrorMessage("Must enter collaborators to add or remove before submitting");
			return false;
	}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-05 19:52:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e5c35d8cdb6adc90c7e55886dc961966</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Has to fill out Add/Remove</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e5c35d8cdb6adc90c7e55886dc961966</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-28 15:21:17</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_14306100dbeadc90c7e55886dc961984
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time>1970-01-01 00:00:00</entered_time><name>Sync Github Repos & Collaborators</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="Jeff Mu">0a020446db4ea410080f71c3e29619ad</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2020-08-05 20:46:51</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>daily</run_type><script><![CDATA[//query sys alias table for things in my scope
//for found sys alias for existing connection
//if exists then get url and credentials
//pass in connection

var scopeAlias = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
scopeAlias.addQuery("name", "GitHub User Management");
scopeAlias.query();
if (scopeAlias.next()){
	var aliasGr = new GlideRecord("sys_alias");
	aliasGr.addQuery("sys_scope", scopeAlias.sys_id);
	aliasGr.query();

	while (aliasGr.next()){
		var connect = new GlideRecord("sys_connection");
		connect.addQuery("connection_alias", aliasGr.sys_id);
		connect.query();
		if (connect.next()){
			var ghUtil = new x_radi_github.GithubUtils();
			//need to  run below for first time population after that only run syncReposInvites, or run the two lines commented instead of syncRepos for rate limit issues
			//ghUtil.syncRepos(aliasGr.sys_id);
			ghUtil.syncReposInvites(aliasGr.sys_id);
			//ghUtil.syncReposCollabs(aliasGr.sys_id);
			ghUtil.cleanUsers();
			gs.info("executing github sync for " + aliasGr.name);
		}
	}
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-05 20:47:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>14306100dbeadc90c7e55886dc961984</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sync Github Repos & Collaborators</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_14306100dbeadc90c7e55886dc961984</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>reese@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-03 13:25:02</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_f5cbd60a1bf964508bc6a68a234bcbf1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Github Sync Repos</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
  
	var requestBody = JSON.parse(request.body.dataString);
	
	var repoID;
	var repoGR;
	var repoName;
	switch(requestBody.action){
		case "created":
			//sync the repo into the table
			repoGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
			repoName = requestBody.repository.name;
			if(repoGR.get('repo', repoName)) {
				repoID = repoGR.sys_id;
				repoGR.owner = requestBody.repository.owner.login;
				repoGR.update();
			}
			else {
				repoGR.initialize();
				repoGR.repo = repoName;
				repoGR.owner = requestBody.repository.owner.login;
				repoID = repoGR.insert();
			}
			//sync the base collaborators on the repo
			var scopeAlias = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
			scopeAlias.addQuery("name", "GitHub User Management");
			scopeAlias.query();
			if (scopeAlias.next()){
				var aliasGr = new GlideRecord("sys_alias");
				aliasGr.addQuery("sys_scope", scopeAlias.sys_id);
				aliasGr.query();
				while (aliasGr.next()){
					var connect = new GlideRecord("sys_connection");
					connect.addQuery("connection_alias", aliasGr.sys_id);
					connect.query();
					if (connect.next()){
						var collabs = new x_radi_github.GithubUtils();
						collabs.syncCollaborators(aliasGr.sys_id.toString(), repoName, repoID);
						gs.info("*** Github Webhook *** " + requestBody.repository.name + " has been added. ");
						
					}
				}
			}
			break;
		case "deleted":
			repoGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
			repoName = requestBody.repository.name;
			if(repoGR.get('repo', repoName)) {
				//delete the users first then the repos
				var deleteUsers = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_users');
				deleteUsers.addQuery("repo", repoGR.sys_id);
				deleteUsers.query();
				while (deleteUsers.next()){
					deleteUsers.deleteRecord();
				}
				//delete the repo
				repoGR.deleteRecord();
				gs.info("*** Github Webook *** " + requestBody.repository.name + " has been removed. ");
			}
			break;
		case "renamed":
			repoGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
			repoName = requestBody.changes.repository.name.from;
			if(repoGR.get('repo', repoName)) {
				repoGR.repo = requestBody.repository.name;
				repoGR.update();
				gs.info("*** Github Webook *** " + requestBody.changes.repository.name.from + " has been renamed to " + requestBody.repository.name);
			}
			break;
		case "added":
		case "edited":
			repoGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
			var collabLogin = requestBody.member.login;
			var collabGR;
			if(repoGR.get('repo', requestBody.repository.name)) 
				repoID = repoGR.sys_id;
				if (repoID){
					collabGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_users');
					collabGR.addQuery('repo', repoID);
					collabGR.addQuery('user', collabLogin);
					collabGR.query();
					if(collabGR.next()) {
						if (requestBody.changes.permission.to == "read" || requestBody.changes.permission.to == "triage"){
							collabGR.admin = false;
							collabGR.push = false;
							collabGR.pull = true;
						}
						else if (requestBody.changes.permission.to == "write" || requestBody.changes.permission.to == "maintain"){
							collabGR.admin = false;
							collabGR.push = true;
							collabGR.pull = true;
						}
						else if (requestBody.changes.permission.to == "admin"){
							collabGR.admin = true;
							collabGR.push = true;
							collabGR.pull = true;
						}
						collabGR.state = "Added";
						collabGR.update();
						gs.info("*** Github Webook *** " + collabLogin + "'s permissions has been edited on the repo " + requestBody.repository.name);
					}
					else {
						collabGR.initialize();
						collabGR.repo = repoID;
						collabGR.user = collabLogin;
						if (requestBody.changes.permission.to == "read" || requestBody.changes.permission.to == "triage"){
							collabGR.admin = false;
							collabGR.push = false;
							collabGR.pull = true;
						}
						else if (requestBody.changes.permission.to == "write" || requestBody.changes.permission.to == "maintain"){
							collabGR.admin = false;
							collabGR.push = true;
							collabGR.pull = true;
						}
						else if (requestBody.changes.permission.to == "admin"){
							collabGR.admin = true;
							collabGR.push = true;
							collabGR.pull = true;
						}
						collabGR.state = "Added";
						collabGR.insert();
						gs.info("*** Github Webook *** " + collabLogin + " has been added on the repo " + requestBody.repository.name);
						}

				}
			//create the repo and add the user
			else{
				repoGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
				repoGR.repo = requestBody.repository.name;
				repoGR.owner = requestBody.repository.owner.login;
				repoID = repoGR.insert();
				
				var collabs = new x_radi_github.GithubUtils();
				collabs.syncCollaborators(requestBody.repository.name, repoID);
				
				if (repoID){
					collabGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_users');
					collabGR.initialize();
					collabGR.repo = repoID;
					collabGR.user = collabLogin;
					if (requestBody.changes.permission.to == "read" || requestBody.changes.permission.to == "triage"){
						collabGR.admin = false;
						collabGR.push = false;
						collabGR.pull = true;
					}
					else if (requestBody.changes.permission.to == "write" || requestBody.changes.permission.to == "maintain"){
						collabGR.admin = false;
						collabGR.push = true;
						collabGR.pull = true;
					}
					else if (requestBody.changes.permission.to == "admin"){
						collabGR.admin = true;
						collabGR.push = true;
						collabGR.pull = true;
					}
					collabGR.state = "Added";
					collabGR.insert();
				}
			}
			break;
		case "removed":
			repoGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_repos');
			if(repoGR.get('repo', requestBody.repository.name)) 
			repoID = repoGR.sys_id;
			var removeCollab = requestBody.member.login;
			var removeGR = new GlideRecord('x_radi_github_users');
			removeGR.addQuery('repo', repoID);
			removeGR.addQuery('user', removeCollab);
			removeGR.query();

			if (removeGR.next()){
				removeGR.state = "Removed";
				gs.info("*** Github Webhook *** " + removeCollab + " has been deleted from the repo " + requestBody.repository.name);
				removeGR.update();

			}
			break;
	}
	
}

)(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_radi_github/github_sync_webhook</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff@rapdev.io</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-20 19:39:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>f5cbd60a1bf964508bc6a68a234bcbf1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Github Sync Repos</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f5cbd60a1bf964508bc6a68a234bcbf1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>reese@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-03 14:09:00</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Github Sync Webhook">39bb160a1bf964508bc6a68a234bcbfb</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="GitHub Guest User Management">db008104db2adc90c7e55886dc961951</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:fed41f42db1b1010c7e55886dc961973</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Dynamic FIeld Display Based on Choice</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	

	if (newValue == "add_user"){
		g_form.setMandatory("repo", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("vendor_name", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("security_check", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("collaborators_add", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("collaborators_remove", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("remove_offboard_date", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("access_level", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("onboard_date", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("offboard_date", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("repo", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("vendor_name", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("security_check", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("collaborators_add", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("access_level", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("onboard_date", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("offboard_date", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("collaborators_remove", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("remove_offboard_date", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("cancel_invitation", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("pending_invitations", false);
		
		
	}
	else if (newValue == "remove_user"){
		g_form.setMandatory("onboard_date", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("offboard_date", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("access_level", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("collaborators_add", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("repo", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("vendor_name", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("security_check", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("collaborators_remove", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("access_level", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("remove_offboard_date", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("pending_invitations", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("repo", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("vendor_name", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("security_check", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("collaborators_add", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("collaborators_remove", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("access_level", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("remove_offboard_date", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("onboard_date", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("offboard_date", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("cancel_invitation", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("pending_invitations", false);
		
	}
	else if (newValue == "cancel_invitation"){
		
		g_form.setMandatory("repo", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("vendor_name", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("security_check", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("collaborators_add", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("access_level", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("onboard_date", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("offboard_date", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("remove_offboard_date", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("collaborators_remove", false);
		g_form.setMandatory("pending_invitations", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("cancel_invitation", true);
		g_form.setDisplay("repo", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("vendor_name", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("security_check", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("collaborators_add", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("collaborators_remove", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("access_level", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("onboard_date", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("offboard_date", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("remove_offboard_date", false);
		g_form.setDisplay("pending_invitations", true);
	}

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-18 19:07:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cd5eeb02db9b1010c7e55886dc961980</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Dynamic FIeld Display Based on Choice</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cd5eeb02db9b1010c7e55886dc961980</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-21 18:48:35</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="GitHub Guest User Management">db008104db2adc90c7e55886dc961951</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:70dd4944db6adc90c7e55886dc96198b</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>offboard date within one year</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

	var dttype = 'day'; //this can be day, hour, minute, second. By default it will return seconds.
	
	var ajax = new GlideAjax('x_radi_github.ClientDateTimeUtils');
	ajax.addParam('sysparm_name','getNowDateTimeDiff');
	ajax.addParam('sysparm_fdt', g_form.getValue("offboard_date"));
	ajax.getXML(doSomething);

	function doSomething(response){
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		if (answer == "true"){
			g_form.clearValue("offboard_date");
			g_form.showFieldMsg("offboard_date", "Offboard date cannot be over year away", "error");

		}
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-06 20:28:40</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7f95aa10dbe650d0c7e55886dc961979</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>offboard date within one year</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7f95aa10dbe650d0c7e55886dc961979</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-21 17:50:20</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_ee809e54db6650d0c7e55886dc9619b9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time>1970-01-01 00:00:00</entered_time><name>Onboard Github Collaborators </name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="Jeff Mu">0a020446db4ea410080f71c3e29619ad</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2020-08-06 18:56:34</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 10:00:00</run_time><run_type>daily</run_type><script><![CDATA[var scopeAlias = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
scopeAlias.addQuery("name", "GitHub User Management");
scopeAlias.query();
if (scopeAlias.next()){
	var aliasGr = new GlideRecord("sys_alias");
	aliasGr.addQuery("sys_scope", scopeAlias.sys_id);
	aliasGr.query();

	while (aliasGr.next()){
		var connect = new GlideRecord("sys_connection");
		connect.addQuery("connection_alias", aliasGr.sys_id);
		connect.query();
		if (connect.next()){
			var ghUtil = new x_radi_github.GithubUtils();
			ghUtil.onboardCollaborator(aliasGr.sys_id);
			//gs.info("executing onboard scheduler!");
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-06 18:56:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>ee809e54db6650d0c7e55886dc9619b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Onboard Github Collaborators </sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_ee809e54db6650d0c7e55886dc9619b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>reese@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-03 13:23:53</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_de7a5690dba650d0c7e55886dc9619ef
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_radi_github.ClientDateTimeUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ClientDateTimeUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ClientDateTimeUtils = Class.create();
ClientDateTimeUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getNowDateTimeDiff: function(){
		
		var date = new GlideDateTime(new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue());
		var firstDT = this.getParameter('sysparm_fdt'); 
		var dur = GlideDateTime.subtract(new GlideDateTime(date.getDate()), new GlideDateTime(firstDT.toString()));
	
		dur = dur.getDisplayValue();
		dur = dur.split(" ")[0];
		if ( dur >= 365 ){
			return true;
		}
		else{
			return false;
		}
	},
	
	dateBeforeAfter: function(){
		
		
		var firstDT = this.getParameter('sysparm_fdt'); 
		var secondDT = this.getParameter('sysparm_sdt'); 
		
		if (firstDT>secondDT){
			return true;
		}

		if (secondDT>firstDT ){
			return false;
		}
		
		if (secondDT == firstDT){
			return "equal";
		}
	},
	
	
    type: 'ClientDateTimeUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-06 19:40:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>de7a5690dba650d0c7e55886dc9619ef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ClientDateTimeUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_de7a5690dba650d0c7e55886dc9619ef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-13 19:55:14</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_a3c9962cdbaa90d0c7e55886dc961921
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="GitHub Guest User Management">db008104db2adc90c7e55886dc961951</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:70dd4944db6adc90c7e55886dc96198b</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Offboard Date after Onboard and today</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	var today = new Date();
	var str = newValue.toString() + " 23:59:59";	
	if (today > new Date(str)){
		g_form.clearValue("offboard_date");
		g_form.showFieldMsg("offboard_date", "Offboard date cannot be before today", "error");
	}

	else if (g_form.getValue("onboard_date") && newValue){
		//if onboard date and new value not empty
		
		
		var ajax = new GlideAjax('x_radi_github.ClientDateTimeUtils');
		ajax.addParam('sysparm_name','dateBeforeAfter');
		ajax.addParam('sysparm_fdt', newValue);
		ajax.addParam('sysparm_sdt', g_form.getValue("onboard_date"));
		ajax.getXML(doSomething);

		
	}
	function doSomething(response){
			var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
			if (answer == "false"){
				g_form.clearValue("offboard_date");
				g_form.showFieldMsg("offboard_date", "Offboard date cannot be before onboard date", "error");
				
			}
			if (answer == "equal"){
				g_form.clearValue("offboard_date");
				g_form.showFieldMsg("offboard_date", "Offboard date cannot be the same as onboard date", "error");
	
			}
			
	}

   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-07 14:23:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a3c9962cdbaa90d0c7e55886dc961921</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Offboard Date after Onboard and today</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a3c9962cdbaa90d0c7e55886dc961921</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-21 17:50:20</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Offboard Date after Onboard and today

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="GitHub Guest User Management">db008104db2adc90c7e55886dc961951</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:b81ecd44db6adc90c7e55886dc961905</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>remove offboard date within one year</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	var today = new Date();
	//alert(today);
	var str = newValue.toString() + " 23:59:59";	
	
	if (today > new Date(str)){
		g_form.clearValue("remove_offboard_date");
		g_form.showFieldMsg("remove_offboard_date", "Offboard date cannot be before today", "error");
	}
	
	var dttype = 'day'; //this can be day, hour, minute, second. By default it will return seconds.
	
	var ajax = new GlideAjax('x_radi_github.ClientDateTimeUtils');
	ajax.addParam('sysparm_name','getNowDateTimeDiff');
	ajax.addParam('sysparm_fdt', g_form.getValue("remove_offboard_date"));
	ajax.getXML(doSomething);

	function doSomething(response){
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		if (answer == "true"){
			g_form.clearValue("remove_offboard_date");
			g_form.showFieldMsg("remove_offboard_date", "Offboard date cannot be over year away", "error");

		}
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-29 21:23:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7ef734751b6f1410924878cf034bcb49</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>remove offboard date within one year</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7ef734751b6f1410924878cf034bcb49</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-29 21:26:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_be609a54db6650d0c7e55886dc9619f4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time>1970-01-01 00:00:00</entered_time><name>Offboard Github Collaborators </name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="Jeff Mu">0a020446db4ea410080f71c3e29619ad</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2020-08-06 18:56:02</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 14:00:00</run_time><run_type>daily</run_type><script><![CDATA[var scopeAlias = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
scopeAlias.addQuery("name", "GitHub User Management");
scopeAlias.query();
if (scopeAlias.next()){
	var aliasGr = new GlideRecord("sys_alias");
	aliasGr.addQuery("sys_scope", scopeAlias.sys_id);
	aliasGr.query();

	while (aliasGr.next()){
		var connect = new GlideRecord("sys_connection");
		connect.addQuery("connection_alias", aliasGr.sys_id);
		connect.query();
		if (connect.next()){
			var ghUtil = new x_radi_github.GithubUtils();
			ghUtil.offboardCollaborator(aliasGr.sys_id);
			//gs.info("executing offboard scheduler!");
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-06 18:56:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>be609a54db6650d0c7e55886dc9619f4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Offboard Github Collaborators </sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_be609a54db6650d0c7e55886dc9619f4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>reese@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-03 13:24:06</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4dfd3668db6e90d0c7e55886dc96199e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_radi_github.GithubClient</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GithubClient</name><script><![CDATA[var GithubClient = Class.create();
GithubClient.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	
	getPendingInvites: function() {
		
		//get the github username
		var githubuser;
		var user = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		user.addQuery("user_name", gs.getUserName());
		user.query();
		if (user.next()){
			githubuser = user.x_radi_github_github_username;
		}
		//get all open invites 
		var invites = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord("x_radi_github_users");
		gr.addEncodedQuery("stateINInvited,Ready");
		gr.query();
		
		while (gr.next()){
			var id = gr.sys_id;
			//if the user is a admin of that repo
			var admin = new GlideRecord("x_radi_github_users");
			
			admin.addQuery("admin", true);
			admin.addQuery("user", githubuser);
			admin.addQuery("repo", gr.repo);
			admin.query();
			if (admin.next()){
				invites.push(gr.sys_id.toString());
			}
			else if(gr.sys_created_by == gs.getUserName()){
				invites.push(gr.sys_id.toString());
			}
			
		}
		return invites.toString();
	},

    type: 'GithubClient'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-07 16:55:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>4dfd3668db6e90d0c7e55886dc96199e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>37</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GithubClient</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub User Management" source="x_radi_github">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="GitHub User Management">31856444dba6dc90c7e55886dc961965</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4dfd3668db6e90d0c7e55886dc96199e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-30 13:22:14</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
